clinical_study.brief_title: Study of RC48-ADC in Patients With HER2-Positive Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: A tolerance, safety and pharmacokinetic ascending dose Phase I Study of RC48-ADC Administered Intravenously to Subjects With HER2-Positive malignant in Advanced Malignant solid Tumors.

primary_outcome.time_frame: DLT will be evaluated on Day 21 during cycle 1
primary_outcome.description: The dose level in which >= 2 out of 6 patients have dose-limiting toxicity (DLT). The MTD is defined as the previous dose level.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety (the drug safety as assessed by NCI-CTCAE v4.0)
secondary_outcome.description: The drug safety as assessed by NCI-CTCAE v4.0

arm_group.description: The phase I component has several dose levels of RC48-ADC (0.5 mg/kg, 1.0mg/kg, 1.5mg/kg, 2.0mg/kg, 2.5mg/kg, 3.0mg/kg, 3.5mg/kg, 4.0 mg/kg and 4.5 mg/kg) and is designed as a traditional dose-escalation study.Determine the recommended Phase II doses and regimens of RC48-ADC. Dosing interval is once two weeks.
